lead_paragraph: The president said he would make it easier for the industry to manufacture in the United States and would further discuss lowering costs behind closed doors.
snippet: The president said he would make it easier for the industry to manufacture in the United States and would further discuss lowering costs behind closed doors....

headline.main: Trump Vows to Ease Rules for Drug Makers, but Again Zeros In on Prices
headline.print_headline: Trump Tells Drug Makers He Will Ease Regulations
